bibl.title: Ink characterization, performed in Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana, in September 2018
bibl.note: I. Note on inks classification. - II. Methods. - III. X-Ray fluorescence (XRF) analysis. - IV. Equipment. - V. Analysis of the inks in the Laurenziana Fayyum scroll (P. Laur. Inv. 19655): V.1. Results; - V.2. Reflectography. - VI. Calamus from Narmuthis-Fayyum, 1st/2nd century CE (without inventory number): VI.1. Photography and NIR reflectography; - VI.2. X-Ray Fluorescence analysis. - VII. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Ira Rabin, Carsten Wintermann & Oliver Hahn, Ink Characterization, Performed in Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana (September 2018).

I. Note on inks classification. - II. Methods. - III. X-Ray fluorescence (XRF) analysis. - IV. Equipment. - V. Analysis of the inks in the Laurenziana Fayyum scroll (P. Laur. Inv. 19655): V.1. Results; - V.2. Reflectography. - VI. Calamus from Narmuthis-Fayyum, 1st/2nd century CE (without inventory number): VI.1. Photography and NIR reflectography; - VI.2. X-Ray Fluorescence analysis. - VII. Conclusion.
